name: Tech Pack Processing
description: Upload CSV files with style numbers to extract tech pack data from Gerber/PLM. Uses Claude AI to analyze tech pack PDFs and extract measurements, materials, closures, and other product attributes.
actions: Upload a CSV file with style numbers
Download Tech Pack PDFs from Gerber/PLM
Extract attributes using Claude AI (measurements, materials, closures, etc.)
Export results to Google Sheets with extraction logic
example_requests: Can you process these tech packs for me?
I need to extract measurements from the spring collection
What fields do you extract from tech packs?
Can you add a new extraction field for belt loops?

low: Add allowed values to existing field
